\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w mind|strong="G2588"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* nation \w has|strong="G3778"\w* grown dense, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w ears|strong="G3775"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w dull|strong="G3975"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w hearing|strong="G3775"\w*, \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w closed|strong="G2576"\w*; \w otherwise|strong="G3379"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w ears|strong="G3775"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* hear, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w mind|strong="G2588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w understand|strong="G4920"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w turn|strong="G1994"\w* – \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w heal|strong="G2390"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

Understand, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4992"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w sent|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* listen.’
\f + \fr 28.29 \ft Some later manuscripts add: After he said these things the Jews left, all the while engaging in a heated debate among themselves.\f*

\w For|strong="G4314"\w* \w two|strong="G1333"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w years|strong="G1333"\w* \w Paul|strong="G1696"\w* \w stayed|strong="G1696"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w house|strong="G3410"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w rented|strong="G3410"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w himself|strong="G2398"\w*, welcoming \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w came|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* see \w him|strong="G3588"\w*,
